definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Now you need to explicitly run the action from the context menu.
sentences.chinese: 现在你需要在上下文菜单里明确地执行这一指令。
它与上下文无关，并且毫不含糊。

sentences.english: The Patriots totally misconstrued this passage and ignored its context.
sentences.chinese: 完全曲解这段经文并忽略其上下文。

sentences.english: As it turned out, we didn't need context-sensitive help.
sentences.chinese: 结果证明我们不需要上下文相关的帮助。

sentences.english: The context should not include the solution or any technical jargon.
sentences.chinese: 上下文不应包括解决方案或任何技术行话。

sentences.english: This allows for easier reuse of the service in new contexts.
sentences.chinese: 这样可以更容易复用新的上下文中的服务。

sentences.english: Service reuse discussions can be cast in the context of process overlaps.
sentences.chinese: 服务重用可以被放在流程重叠的上下文中去讨论。

sentences.english: They provide the online contexts for the social behaviors we exhibit.
sentences.chinese: 它们为我们所展示的社会行为提供了联机上下文。

sentences.english: The cross reference for the specified naming context could not BE found.
sentences.chinese: 找不到指定的命名上下文的互交参考。

sentences.english: A method reducing Cost of Service based on Context-Aware Computing is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出基于觉察上下文计算的降低服务成本的方法。

sentences.english: One of the best ways to learn an idiom is by looking at the context in which it is used.
sentences.chinese: 学习成语的最好方法之一是查看它所在的上下文。

sentences.english: This business object will define the transient context used.
sentences.chinese: 这个业务对象将定义所使用的瞬态上下文。

sentences.english: Multiple objects can live inside a context.
sentences.chinese: 多个对象可以存在于一个上下文中。

sentences.english: How does WCF instancing affect the context in which methods are called?
sentences.chinese: 如何在WCF实例化影响的方法被称为上下文吗？

sentences.english: This enables context-independent optimizations to be performed.
sentences.chinese: 这就可以执行上下文独立的优化。

definition: context/the surrounding words/same as 上下文
part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
